title: Dr. Mary Chinery-Hesse | Centre for Regional Integration in Africa

organizations.name: Centre for Regional Integration in Africa
quotes: Dr. Mary Chinery-Hesse | Centre for Regional Integration in Africa

organizations.name: African Union Panel of the Wise
quotes: She currently serves on the five-member African Union Panel of the Wise, representing West Africa, and is a Member of the Pan African Network of the Wise.

organizations.name: Pan African Network of the Wise
quotes: She currently serves on the five-member African Union Panel of the Wise, representing West Africa, and is a Member of the Pan African Network of the Wise.

organizations.name: United Nations
quotes: Dr. Chinery-Hesse has held distinguished positions both within the United Nations system and Africa first, as Resident Coordinator of the United Nations System and Resident Representative of the United Nations Development Programme (UNDP)

organizations.name: United Nations Development Programme (UNDP)
quotes: Dr. Chinery-Hesse has held distinguished positions both within the United Nations system and Africa first, as Resident Coordinator of the United Nations System and Resident Representative of the United Nations Development Programme (UNDP)

organizations.name: International Labour Organisation (ILO)
quotes: subsequently Deputy Director – General of the International Labour Organisation (ILO) in Geneva, with the rank of Under-Secretary –General of the United Nations.

roles.title: Resident Coordinator of the United Nations System
quotes: Dr. Chinery-Hesse has held distinguished positions both within the United Nations system and Africa first, as Resident Coordinator of the United Nations System and Resident Representative of the United Nations Development Programme (UNDP)

roles.title: Resident Representative of the United Nations Development Programme (UNDP)
quotes: Dr. Chinery-Hesse has held distinguished positions both within the United Nations system and Africa first, as Resident Coordinator of the United Nations System and Resident Representative of the United Nations Development Programme (UNDP)

roles.title: Deputy Director – General of the International Labour Organisation (ILO)
quotes: subsequently Deputy Director – General of the International Labour Organisation (ILO) in Geneva, with the rank of Under-Secretary –General of the United Nations.

roles.title: Under-Secretary –General of the United Nations
quotes: subsequently Deputy Director – General of the International Labour Organisation (ILO) in Geneva, with the rank of Under-Secretary –General of the United Nations.

roles.title: Chief Advisor to the former President of Ghana
quotes: On retiring from the service of the United Nations, Dr. Mary Chinery-Hesse assumed the position of the Chief Advisor to the former President of Ghana, His Excellency John Agyekum Kufuor.
subsequently Deputy Director – General of the International Labour Organisation (ILO) in Geneva, with the rank of Under-Secretary –General of the United Nations.

Dr. Chinery-Hesse has received several prestigious decorations both nationally and internationally, including Ghana’s highest National Award, the Order of the Star of Ghana, and a Laureate of the prestigious Gusi Peace Prize, the Asian equivalent of the Nobel Peace Prize.
